citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There were 11 medications in the facility that were expired. They were stored with other medications that are in use and
could also be used. Expired medications can change to lose effectiveness and use of the expired medication may result in
inadequate dosing. Expired medications must be removed from the facility to prevent their use.
Baytril 136 mg tabs exp 12/2023 Famotidine 50 mg tabs exp 12/2022
Trazadone 50 mg tabs exp 10/2023 Cephalexin 500 mg capsules exp 5/2024
Vetprofin 25 mg tabs exp 4/2021 Meloxicam 15 mg tabs exp 8/2023
Meloxicam 7.5 mg tabs exp 7/2023 Meloxicam 1.5 mg/ml liquid exp 9/2023
Gabapentin 300 mg tabs exp 5/2024 Lactulose syrup exp 11/2022
Amoxicillin 250mg/ml drops exp 5/2023
Correction date: 14 June, 2024
NOTE: Medications were removed during the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There were 11 medications in the facility that were expired. They were stored with other medications that are in use and 
could also be used. Expired medications can change to lose effectiveness and use of the expired medication may result in 
inadequate dosing. Expired medications must be removed from the facility to prevent their use.  
 
Baytril 136 mg tabs exp 12/2023 Famotidine 50 mg tabs exp 12/2022 
Trazadone 50 mg tabs exp 10/2023 Cephalexin 500 mg capsules exp 5/2024 
Vetprofin 25 mg tabs exp 4/2021 Meloxicam 15 mg tabs exp 8/2023 
Meloxicam 7.5 mg tabs exp 7/2023 Meloxicam 1.5 mg/ml liquid exp 9/2023 
Gabapentin 300 mg tabs exp 5/2024 Lactulose syrup exp 11/2022 
Amoxicillin 250mg/ml drops exp 5/2023 
 
 
Correction date: 14 June, 2024 
NOTE: Medications were removed during the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
